text: Daniel Richard "Danny" McBride (born December 29, 1976) is an American actor, producer, screenwriter and stand-up comedian. His movie roles included Pineapple Express (2008), Despicable Me (2010) and Your Highness (2011). He was born in Statesboro, Georgia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Actors from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:American movie actors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Living people Category:Writers from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Danny McBride
